steps: In-dpda was alternately immersed into Zn(NO3)2 solution and ligand solution for 20 min with intermediate washing steps.
The process was repeated several cycles (0 to 30).
The product was washed with methanol for 3 times.

chemicals_used.RB: 0.015 mmol, 10 mL methanol and 10 mL H2O

steps: In-dpda was immersed into Zn(NO3)2 solution for 20 min.
Then immersed into the guest solution (F or RB) for 5 min.
Subsequently, the product was immersed into the ligand solution for 20 min with the washing step behind.
F ⊂ ZIF-8-on-In-dpda was alternately immersed into Zn(NO3)2 solution and Hmim solution with intermediate washing steps for 5 cycles to form blank ZIF-8 layers between F and RB.
Then the RB solution was introduced between the immersion of Hmim solution and blank methanol.
After washing with methanol for 3 times and drying under the room temperature, the F-RB ⊂ ZIF-8-on-In-dpda was obtained.

histamine_sensing_experiments.sample_preparation: 10 mg of F-10c ⊂ ZIF-8-on-In-dpda was dispersed into 80 mL deionized water to form a stable aqueous suspension.
histamine_sensing_experiments.experiment_process: Equal volume histamine aqueous solution with different concentrations (0 to 10 μM) were mixed with 2 mL of the previously described F-10c ⊂ ZIF-8-on-In-dpda suspension.
histamine_sensing_experiments.measurement: The fluorescent emission spectra were measured under the 335 nm excitation.
